Package index

All functions

audioplot()
Fast Spectrogram with Derived Pseudo-Oscillogram and Power Spectrum
batch_song_stats()
Apply song_stats functions to Wave Objects in Parallel
broadband_activity()
Broadband Activity Index
broadband_activity2()
Broadband Activity Index V2
clean_wave()
Denoise a Wave for temporal measurements
export_stats()
Export Data Frames and HTML Widgets from a List
get_mode()
Calculate the mode(s) of a vector
launch_app()
Launch a Shiny App from the package
list_waves()
List wave files in a directory
meanspectrum_plotly()
Interactive Mean Spectrum
multiplot_ggplot()
Multiplot including Spectrogram, Mean Power Spectrum, and
oscillogram_ggplot()
Oscillogram with ggplot2
oscillogram_plotly()
Interactive Oscillogram
song_stats_hq()
Temporal and Spectral Statistics for HQ (Narrow-band) Songs
song_stats_lq()
Temporal and Spectral Statistics of LQ (Broad-band) Songs.
spectral_stats()
Calculate Spectral Statistics
spectrogram_ggplot()
Standardized Spectrogram plus Mean Power Spectrum
spectrogram_plotly()
Interactive Spectrogram with Standardized Resolution
spectrum_df()
Spectrum Table (Tibble, Data Frame)
spectrum_ggplot()
Power Spectrum with ggplot2
spectrum_plotly()
Interactive Spectrum Plot using Plotly
spectrum_pop()
Plot a representative spectrum of a population (or subspecies, species, etc.)
wave_df()
Extract the waveform values as a table
wave_info()
List and Summarize Wave Objects in the Environment
